1.0.name: wordpress/quoteworthy
1.0.description: A widget that takes a user-provided list of quotes, song lyrics, etc. delimited by newlines, chooses one randomly and displays it as a widget in the sidebar. Has an Options page located under Settings (>=2.5) or Options(<2.5).

1.1.name: wordpress/quoteworthy
